TEXT.English: Resource Display
TEXT.French: Affichage des Ressources
TEXT.German: Ressourcenanzeige
TEXT.Italian: Resource Display
TEXT.Spanish: Resource Display
TEXT.Finnish: Resource Display

TEXT.English: Resource Display shows on main screen what resources player has acquired. Clicking scoreboard button toggles also resource display if this option has been enabled.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche sur l'écran principal les ressources que possède le joueur. Un Clic sur la barre de score permet de changer l'affichage de ces informations lorsque l'option est activé.
TEXT.German: Die Ressourcenanzeige zeigt auf dem Hauptbild an, zu welche Ressourcen der Spieler Zugriff hat. Durch Klicken auf den Schalter der Punkteanzeige kann man die Ressourcenanzeige ebenfalls ein- und ausschalten solange diese Option aktiviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: Resource Display shows on main screen what resources player has acquired. Clicking scoreboard button toggles also resource display if this option has been enabled.
TEXT.Spanish: Resource Display shows on main screen what resources player has acquired. Clicking scoreboard button toggles also resource display if this option has been enabled.
TEXT.Finnish: Resource Display shows on main screen what resources player has acquired. Clicking scoreboard button toggles also resource display if this option has been enabled.

TEXT.English: All|Rush|Strategic|Manufactured|Food|Luxury
TEXT.French: Toutes|Militaires|Stratégiques|Manufacturés|Nourriture|Luxe
TEXT.German: Alle|Kampf|Strategisch|Produziert|Nahrung|Luxus
TEXT.Italian: All|Rush|Strategic|Manufactured|Food|Luxury
TEXT.Spanish: All|Rush|Strategic|Manufactured|Food|Luxury
TEXT.Finnish: All|Rush|Strategic|Manufactured|Food|Luxury

TEXT.English: Settings: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]All[COLOR_REVERT] shows all resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rush[COLOR_REVERT] shows early military resources like copper and iron, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Strategic[COLOR_REVERT] shows industrial and modern era strategic resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Manufactured[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources made with buildings, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT] shows all food resources and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources that affect happiness.
TEXT.French: Paramètres : [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toutes[COLOR_REVERT] affiche toutes les ressources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Militaires[COLOR_REVERT] affiche les ressources militaires de base (cuivre, fer,...), [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stratégiques[COLOR_REVERT] affiche les ressources stratégiques des ères industrielle et moderne, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Manufacturés[COLOR_REVERT] affiche les ressources produites par les bâtiments, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nourriture[COLOR_REVERT] affiche les ressources de type nourriture et [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxe[COLOR_REVERT] affiche les produits de luxe et ayant une influence sur le moral des Villes.
TEXT.German: Einstellungen: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alle[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt alle Ressourcen, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kampf[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt frühe militärische Ressourcen wie Kupfer oder Eisen, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Strategisch[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt strategische Ressourcen aus der industriellen und modernen Ära, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Produziert[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt Ressourcen, die durch Gebäude erzeugt wurden, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt alle Nahrungsressourcen und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxus[COLOR_REVERT] zeigt Ressourcen, die die Zufriedenheit beeinflussen.
TEXT.Italian: Settings: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]All[COLOR_REVERT] shows all resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rush[COLOR_REVERT] shows early military resources like copper and iron, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Strategic[COLOR_REVERT] shows industrial and modern era strategic resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Manufactured[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources made with buildings, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT] shows all food resources and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources that affect happiness.
TEXT.Spanish: Settings: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]All[COLOR_REVERT] shows all resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rush[COLOR_REVERT] shows early military resources like copper and iron, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Strategic[COLOR_REVERT] shows industrial and modern era strategic resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Manufactured[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources made with buildings, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT] shows all food resources and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources that affect happiness.
TEXT.Finnish: Settings: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]All[COLOR_REVERT] shows all resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rush[COLOR_REVERT] shows early military resources like copper and iron, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Strategic[COLOR_REVERT] shows industrial and modern era strategic resources, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Manufactured[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources made with buildings, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT] shows all food resources and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury[COLOR_REVERT] shows resources that affect happiness.

TEXT.English: RoM Tech tree era colors
TEXT.French: Couleur des Eres pour l'Arbre de Techs RoM
TEXT.German: RoM Technologiebaum Zeitalter-Farben
TEXT.Italian: RoM Tech tree era colors
TEXT.Spanish: RoM Tech tree era colors
TEXT.Finnish: RoM Tech tree era colors

TEXT.English: This setting changes tech tree screen to use Rise of Mankind era coloring method which is different from BUG mod's method. Requires restart before the change to this setting is applied in-game.
TEXT.French: Ce paramètre change l'écran de l'arbre des Techs, au niveau des Couleurs utilisées pour différencier les Eres. Nécessite le redémarrage du Jeu.
TEXT.German: Diese Einstellung verändert das Technologiefenster indem die Rise of Mankind-Farbdarstellung gewählt wird, die sich vom BUG-Mod unterscheidet. Erfordert einen Neustart des CIV-Programms.
TEXT.Italian: This setting changes tech tree screen to use Rise of Mankind era coloring method which is different from BUG mod's method. Requires restart before the change to this setting is applied in-game.
TEXT.Spanish: This setting changes tech tree screen to use Rise of Mankind era coloring method which is different from BUG mod's method. Requires restart before the change to this setting is applied in-game.
TEXT.Finnish: This setting changes tech tree screen to use Rise of Mankind era coloring method which is different from BUG mod's method. Requires restart before the change to this setting is applied in-game.
